content:
TITLE: Copying Data Between Home Assistant Containers in Proxmox
DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to copy data from one Home Assistant Container to another Home Assistant Container. It uses curl to download the script from the community GitHub repository and executes it immediately.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/tools/copy-data/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/main/tools/copy-data/home-assistant-container-copy-data-home-assistant-container.sh)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Copying Data from Home Assistant Core to Home Assistant Container
DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to migrate data from a Home Assistant Core installation to a Home Assistant Container. The script is downloaded from the community GitHub repository and executed in the Proxmox Shell.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/tools/copy-data/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/main/tools/copy-data/home-assistant-core-copy-data-home-assistant-container.sh)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Copying Data from Home Assistant Container to Home Assistant Core
DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to migrate data from a Home Assistant Container to a Home Assistant Core installation. It pulls the script from the community GitHub repository and runs it in the Proxmox Shell.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/tools/copy-data/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/main/tools/copy-data/home-assistant-container-copy-data-home-assistant-core.sh)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Copying Data from Podman Home Assistant to Home Assistant Container
DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to migrate data from a Podman-based Home Assistant installation to a Home Assistant Container. It downloads the script from GitHub and executes it in the Proxmox Shell.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/tools/copy-data/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/main/tools/copy-data/podman-home-assistant-copy-data-home-assistant-container.sh)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Copying Data from Home Assistant Container to Podman Home Assistant
DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to transfer data from a Home Assistant Container to a Podman-based Home Assistant installation. The script is downloaded from the community GitHub repository and run in the Proxmox environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/tools/copy-data/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/main/tools/copy-data/home-assistant-container-copy-data-podman-home-assistant.sh)"
```

LANGUAGE: bash

DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to copy data from one Zigbee2MQTT installation to another Zigbee2MQTT installation. It pulls the script from the community GitHub repository and runs it in the Proxmox Shell.

TITLE: Copying Data from Zwavejs2MQTT to Zwave JS UI
DESCRIPTION: This command fetches and executes a script to migrate data from a Zwavejs2MQTT installation to a Zwave JS UI installation. The script is downloaded from the community GitHub repository and executed in the Proxmox Shell.

TITLE: Updating Repository in Debian/Ubuntu LXC Containers
DESCRIPTION: A bash command to automatically update the repository to use the new community-scripts/ProxmoxVE repository on Debian/Ubuntu LXC containers. This represents a breaking change in the update process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/update-repo.sh)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting Proxmox VE Script Changes in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: A markdown formatted changelog that tracks modifications and updates to various LXC container scripts and installations in Proxmox VE, organized by date and categorized by type of change.
SOURCE: https://github.com/community-scripts/proxmoxve/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
### Changed

- **Adguard Home LXC**
  - New V2 Install Script
- **Zigbee2MQTT LXC**
  - New V2 Install Script
- **Home Assistant Container LXC**
  - Update Menu usability improvements
```
